name: happy-ryu-18 // A Camputers Lynx Ryu (The 'Happy Ryu' Series)
description:
Not too many people know about the Camputers Lynx. That's okay though. I'm okay with that.

Part of a series of 43 movies using vintage computers and game consoles. Complete info at: https://github.com/electrocomfort/art-units/tree/main/happy-ryu
